pre.h2: 回傳範例 GET /api/v1/whs/duty/RowUnid/00A05C2D-56D4-4C65-906B-B0A0B2B3A4BF/GetWorkingDateAllDetail { [{"rowUnid":"00A05C2D-56D4-4C65-906B-B0A0B2B3A4BF", "EmpID":"309426", "WorkingDate":"2020-04-07T00:00:00", "totalWorkingHours":4.0, "FilledHours":8.0, "IsFinish":"未送出", "TypeCode":"C01", "TypeName":"CT/ICT", "JobCode":"Bus_1", "JobName":"市話語音", "WorkingHours":3.5, "Note":"TEST"}] }

summary.returns: 傳回取得單日JobCode（樹狀）清單
